entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or snow beginning this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
